name: blob_grow_base
description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

name: amorphous core
description: An experiment gone horribly right. This amorphous mass seems to have finished developing; its advanced internal structures testifying to that.  It is capable of locomotion through internal hydraulic pressure, capable of moving substantial loads, acting as a nursery for other blobs, and, in an astounding display of intelligence, is capable of manipulating anything it's attached to, whether blob-based or otherwise, through extended pseudopods.  You think you might be able to manipulate it, and through it, all its attached parts.  Though to do so you'll have to position yourself to be in contact with it; and it appears unnervingly willing to accomodate you...

name: growing blob
description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires time to fully develop.

use_action.msg: It balloons back to full size.
use_action.not_ready_msg: It hasn't quite fully grown yet.

name: growing gelatinous mass
description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: gelatinous mass
description: A small portion of blob tissue that split off from the original. This appears to be the "worker", being able to be reshaped and retain different shapes and forms even under force.  With enough strength, you think you can pull it apart.

use_action.msg: You fumble as the blob starts to multiply rapidly!

name: multiplying gelatinous mass
description: Having been fed, this blob is now rapidly multiplying into other copies of itself; extremely noisy copies!  And even worse, it's stuck to your hands until whatever it's doing is done!  Catch those blobs before they bring in every zombie for miles!

use_action.friendly_msg: A blob splits and bounces away!
use_action.hostile_msg: A blob splits and bounces away!

name: biting blob
description: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon; meant to be stretched across a frame as a form of barrier.  It has evolved the ability to constantly generate calcified protrusions which are then controlled by sinous tensile strands.  These "teeth" can then be used to latch and wound anything unfortunate enough to be nearby.  The outer membrane has also become significantly thicker in order to support its more strenuous movement; though it seems pliable enough to pull apart...

name: growing keratinous mass
description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: gel razor
description: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  Instead of calcifying large amounts of calcified teeth, it has instead calcified a single large blade-like mass; which it uses defensively and offensively.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.

name: growing bladed mass
description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: gel shooter
description: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  It trawls the ground for material, which it then strips of nutrition.  The remainder is then expelled out at significant velocity towards any nearby threats.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.  It seems pliable enough to pull apart...

name: growing beaded mass
description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: gel lancer
description: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  Evolving incredible abilities of perception, it is capable of locating and discerning possible threats within a large radius.  When a potential threat is located, it fires a small, calcified projectile with incredible speed and accuracy.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.

name: growing spiny mass
description: Not quite fully grown, this blob requires nourishment to fully develop.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: metalloid
description: The metallic addition to this blob's diet has changed it significantly.  While retaining the resilience and malleability of its once simpler form, it has gained the considerable abilities of perception and stimulus response.  When directly threatened, it is able to shift and alter its microfibers, hardening its membrane to an almost steel-hard shell.  You can still pull it apart with enough force.  It's also really gray.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: gel puffer
description: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  A filter feeder, it strips any water it processes of nutrients and expels the remainder towards any nearby threats.  The process of filter-feeding also makes the remaining liquid viscous, though it also dissipates fairly quickly.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: fuel puffer
description: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  A rather picky eater, it feeds on chemicals found within gasoline.  The digestion process turns the result incredibly viscous which, when threats come near, is launched; ensnaring anything it hits.  Furthermore, an ignition gland located just under the membrane allows it to ignite the flammable liquid before launching it.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: acid puffer
description: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  A filter feeder, the digestion process produces highly acidic byproducts; which is then expelled at any nearby enemies.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.

use_action.msg: The blob balloons to full size.

name: earthen roller
description: A large, spherical blob the size of a large truck tire.  The outer layer has compacted itself into a solid shell; offering great resilience.  Having grown to full size, it seems content to simply sit there.

name: oozing feeder
description: An engorged version of its former self, this blob has much larger, yet no more complex, internal structures; allowing it to process organic matter into a nutrient-rich substance.  This blob has lost most of its malleability, but can be reshaped to change its function by "a"ctivating it.

use_action.msg: You spend some time shaping the ooze.

name: oozing assimilator
description: An engorged version of its former self, this blob has much larger, yet no more complex, internal structures; allowing it to process organic matter into a nutrient-rich substance.  This blob has lost most of its malleability, but can be reshaped to change its function by "a"ctivating it.  It's currently specialized to recycle blob scraps into energy for other blobs.

use_action.msg: You spend some time shaping the ooze.

name: oozing pod
description: While the blob is very eager to be fed, it's not as enthusiastic about giving up said items.  A few alterations are necessary. It cannot longer digest organic matter in this form, but instead holds the nutrients for other blobs as well as other items.

use_action.msg: You spend some time shaping the ooze.

name: oozing receptacle
description: While the blob is very eager to be fed, it's not as enthusiastic about giving up said items.  A few alterations are necessary. It cannot longer digest organic matter in this form, but instead holds the nutrients for other blobs as well as other items.

use_action.msg: You spend some time shaping the ooze.

name: oozing tank
description: While the blob is very eager to be fed, it's not as enthusiastic about giving up said items.  A few alterations are necessary. It cannot longer digest organic matter in this form, but instead holds the nutrients for other blobs as well as other items.

use_action.msg: You spend some time shaping the ooze.

name: oozing wheel
description: Further shaping this oozing mass has resulted in something that appears to be a cross between a wheel, an otherworldly abomination, and one of those old squeezy toys.

use_action.msg: You spend some time shaping the ooze.
